title: Плата за любовь
overview: Mikhail left to serve in the army, and Lida remained waiting for him in his hometown. After the first skirmish with the "grandfathers" - a trial and a sentence for manslaughter. Having been released, Mikhail returns home, where everything has become different - life in the city is determined by the local oligarch, who is served by both Mikhail's half-brother and Lida, who performs "special functions." Mikhail finds his place in this life, but soon he has a conflict with the son of the oligarch - an influential and presumptuous businessman who decides to eliminate Mikhail. Only those who love can save him. At the same time, they are ready to pay the highest price for their love...
